verses.verse: "Flee <S%H5756><s%> for safety, <S%H1121><s%> you children of Benjamin, <S%H1144><s%> out of the midst <S%H7130><s%> of Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> and blow <S%H8628><s%> the trumpet <S%H7782><s%> in Tekoa, <S%H8620><s%> and raise up <S%H5375><s%> a signal <S%H4864><s%> on Beth Haccherem; <S%H1021><s%> for evil <S%H7451><s%> looks <S%H8259><s%> forth from the north, <S%H6828><s%> and a great <S%H1419><s%> destruction. <S%H7667><s%>
The <S%H1820><s%> comely <S%H5116><s%> and delicate <S%H6026><s%> one, <S%H1323><s%> the daughter of Zion, <S%H6726><s%> will I cut off.

For Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies <S%H6635><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Cut down <S%H3772><s%> trees, <S%H6097><s%> and cast <S%H8210><s%> up a mound <S%H5550><s%> against Jerusalem: <S%H3389><s%> this is the city <S%H5892><s%> to be visited; <S%H6485><s%> she is wholly oppression <S%H6233><s%> in the midst of her. <S%H7130><s%>

As a well <S%H953><s%> casts forth <S%H6979><s%> its waters, <S%H4325><s%> so she casts forth <S%H6979><s%> her wickedness: <S%H7451><s%> violence <S%H2555><s%> and destruction <S%H7701><s%> is heard <S%H8085><s%> in her; <S%H6440><s%> before me continually <S%H8548><s%> is sickness <S%H2483><s%> and wounds. <S%H4347><s%>

Be instructed, <S%H3256><s%> Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> lest my soul <S%H5315><s%> be alienated <S%H3363><s%> from you; <S%H7760><s%> lest I make you a desolation, <S%H8077><s%> a land <S%H776><s%> not inhabited. <S%H3427><s%>"

Thus says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies, <S%H6635><s%> "They shall thoroughly <S%H5953><s%> glean <S%H5953><s%> the remnant <S%H7611><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> like a vine. <S%H1612><s%> Turn again <S%H7725><s%> your hand <S%H3027><s%> as a grape gatherer <S%H1219><s%> into the baskets. <S%H5552><s%>"

To whom shall I speak <S%H1696><s%> and testify, <S%H1696><s%> that they may hear? <S%H8085><s%> Behold, <S%H241><s%> their ear is uncircumcised, <S%H6189><s%> and they can't <S%H3201><s%> listen. <S%H7181><s%> Behold, <S%H1697><s%> the word of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has become a reproach <S%H2781><s%> to them. <S%H2654><s%> They have no delight in it.

Therefore I am full <S%H4392><s%> of the wrath <S%H2534><s%> of Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%> I am weary <S%H3811><s%> with holding in. <S%H3557><s%> "Pour it out <S%H8210><s%> on the children <S%H5768><s%> in the street, <S%H2351><s%> and on the assembly <S%H5475><s%> of young men <S%H970><s%> together; <S%H3162><s%> for even the husband <S%H376><s%> with the wife <S%H802><s%> shall be taken, <S%H3920><s%> the aged <S%H2205><s%> with him who is full <S%H4390><s%> of days. <S%H3117><s%>

"For from their least <S%H6996><s%> even to their greatest, <S%H1419><s%> everyone is given <S%H1214><s%> to covetousness; <S%H1215><s%> and from the prophet <S%H5030><s%> even to the priest, <S%H3548><s%> everyone deals <S%H6213><s%> falsely. <S%H8267><s%>

Were they ashamed <S%H3001><s%> when they had committed <S%H6213><s%> abomination? <S%H8441><s%> No, <S%H1571><s%> they were not at all <S%H954><s%> ashamed, <S%H954><s%> neither <S%H1571><s%> could <S%H3045><s%> they blush. <S%H3637><s%> Therefore they shall fall <S%H5307><s%> among those who fall; <S%H5307><s%> at the time <S%H6256><s%> that I visit <S%H6485><s%> them, <S%H3782><s%> they shall be cast down," says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

Thus says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> "Stand <S%H5975><s%> in the ways <S%H1870><s%> and see, <S%H7200><s%> and ask <S%H7592><s%> for the old <S%H5769><s%> paths, <S%H5410><s%> <S%H2896><s%> 'Where is the good way? <S%H1870><s%>' and walk <S%H3212><s%> in it, <S%H4672><s%> and you will find rest <S%H4771><s%> for your souls. <S%H5315><s%> But they said, <S%H559><s%> <S%H3212><s%> 'We will not walk in it.'

I set <S%H6965><s%> watchmen <S%H6822><s%> over you, <S%H7181><s%> saying, 'Listen to the sound <S%H6963><s%> of the trumpet! <S%H7782><s%>' But they said, <S%H559><s%> <S%H7181><s%> 'We will not listen!'
Therefore hear, <S%H8085><s%> you nations, <S%H1471><s%> and know, <S%H3045><s%> congregation, <S%H5712><s%> what is among them.

Hear, <S%H8085><s%> earth! <S%H776><s%> Behold, <S%H935><s%> I will bring evil <S%H7451><s%> on this people, <S%H5971><s%> even the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of their thoughts, <S%H4284><s%> because they have not listened <S%H7181><s%> to my words; <S%H1697><s%> and as for my law, <S%H8451><s%> they have rejected it. <S%H3988><s%>

To what purpose comes <S%H935><s%> there to me frankincense <S%H3828><s%> from Sheba, <S%H7614><s%> and the sweet <S%H2896><s%> cane <S%H7070><s%> from a far <S%H4801><s%> country? <S%H776><s%> your burnt offerings <S%H5930><s%> are not acceptable, <S%H7522><s%> nor your sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> pleasing to me. <S%H6149><s%>"

Therefore thus says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> "Behold, <S%H5414><s%> I will lay stumbling blocks <S%H4383><s%> before this people. <S%H5971><s%> The fathers <S%H1><s%> and the sons <S%H1121><s%> together <S%H3162><s%> shall stumble <S%H3782><s%> against them. <S%H7934><s%> The neighbor and his friend <S%H7453><s%> shall perish. <S%H6><s%>"

They take hold <S%H2388><s%> of bow <S%H7198><s%> and spear. <S%H3591><s%> They are cruel, <S%H394><s%> and have no mercy. <S%H7355><s%> Their voice <S%H6963><s%> roars <S%H1993><s%> like the sea, <S%H3220><s%> and they ride <S%H7392><s%> on horses, <S%H5483><s%> everyone set in array, <S%H6186><s%> as a man <S%H376><s%> to the battle, <S%H4421><s%> against you, <S%H1323><s%> daughter of Zion. <S%H6726><s%>"
